title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Exploring the Relationship Between Mathematical Practices and Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-level mathematics teaching experience and understanding of basic research methodologies
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: An educational design plan can be proposed by utilizing the triangulation method of the mathematics action research methodology
The impact of mathematicians' actual problem-solving processes on secondary mathematics education can be critically analyzed
Acknowledging the limitations of research methodologies, an educational design incorporating multiple approaches can be proposed

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
